thread.title: David S Lepkowski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by David S Lepkowski

author: David S Lepkowski
title: David S Lepkowski
text: Love gardner white! Our sales rep larry spokes was very professional. He was kind and knew what he was doing :-) I love the quality in your furniture! I'm loving my new kitchen table and fire place. Still waiting on my sectional...but its beautiful! Cant wait to get it. Id recommend everyone to go to gardner white. Great prices, great deals, great quality in furniture! :-)
